H0.text: Destroy microbes is the action performed by chemicals produced by specialized cells that protect humans from some infections.

H1.text: Recycle nutrients are chemicals produced by specialized cells that help protect humans from some infections.

H2.text: Allow locomotion is the property of the chemicals produced by specialized cells that protect humans from some infections.

H3.text: Coordinate movement is the action of chemicals produced by specialized cells that protect humans from some infections.

A4.text: Enzymes such as lysozyme and phospholipase A2 in saliva, tears, and breast milk are also antibacterials.

A5.text: Gastric acid serves as a chemical defense against ingested pathogens.
